name: Frame-Visual Ultra
description: The most optimized timing helper. Uses a Spatial Grid Engine to handle extreme object counts with zero FPS drop.

enabled.name: Enable Mod
enabled.description: Toggle the timing helper logic on or off.

glow-color-green.name: Safe Color
glow-color-green.description: The color applied to hazards when in a safe timing window.

glow-opacity.name: Glow Opacity
glow-opacity.description: Adjust how bright the visual feedback appears.

stats-counter.name: Stats Counter
stats-counter.description: Show the Early/Mid/Late click tracking UI on screen.
